-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/githubuser/diagrams-mindmap#readme</a>
@package diagrams-mindmap
@version 0.1.0.0

module Construct

-- | Topics in a mindmap
data Topic
topic :: String -> Topic

-- | Directed relations between topics with descriptions
data Relation

-- | Arrow operator for creating relations
(|->) :: (String, String) -> String -> Relation

-- | auxiliary operator for use with the arrow operator
(-|) :: String -> String -> (String, String)

-- | A mindmap in its most basic form consists of a collection of topics
--   and their relations. These can be further augmented to include
--   groupings, colors, and other layout or appearance features.
data Mindmap
instance GHC.Show.Show Construct.Relation
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Construct.Relation
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Construct.Relation
instance GHC.Show.Show Construct.Topic
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Construct.Topic
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Construct.Topic

module Example
topic_strings :: [String]
topics :: [Topic]
relations :: [Relation]

module Lib
someFunc :: IO ()
